name: Persistence Via TypedPaths
description: Detects modification addition to the 'TypedPaths' key in the user or admin registry from a non standard application. Which might indicate persistence attempt
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Explorer\\TypedPaths\\*) AND (NOT (process.executable:(C\:\\Windows\\explorer.exe OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\explorer.exe))))`
